scripts.build: bun run ts:build && bun run --filter './packages/*' build
scripts.clean: bun run clean:generated && bun run clean:dependencies
scripts.clean:dependencies: rm -rf packages/*/node_modules || true; rm -rf node_modules || true
scripts.clean:generated: rm -rf dist || true; rm -rf packages/*/dist || true; rm -rf packages/*/temp || true
